title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When using the SaveAs function, the file is saved without an extension and the icon changes to a generic file icon.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed. The icon should remain as the parent javafile icon.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., moving an existing class)
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog box will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Enter a filename without specifying the file extension
7) Click Ok.

Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but the file extension is not shown.
